blogPost.excerpt: Take your metrics on the go with our iPhone app! The ChartMogul Subscription Data Platform makes it easy to import your billing data and then analyze it like a pro with industry-leading subscription analytics.
blogPost.body: Take your metrics on the go with our iPhone app! The ChartMogul Subscription Data Platform makes it easy to import your billing data and then analyze it like a pro with industry-leading subscription analytics.
blogPost.title: The ChartMogul iPhone App - Check your SaaS metrics on the go
blogPost.author: Ilia Markov

localize.description: 使用我们的iPhone应用程序随时随地使用您的指标！ChartMogul订阅数据平台使您可以轻松导入账单数据，然后使用业界领先的订阅分析像专业人员一样进行分析。
localize.tagline: 随时随地检查您的SaaS指标

localize.description: 使用我們的iPhone應用程序隨時隨地使用您的指標！ChartMogul訂閱數據平臺使您可以輕鬆導入賬單數據，然後使用業界領先的訂閱分析像專業人員一樣進行分析。
localize.tagline: 隨時隨地檢查您的SaaS指標

previous.excerpt: Unubo makes it easy for you to track progress by bringing metrics from your favourite tools into one place.
previous.title: Unubo phase zero - Simplify tracking progress in your startup

localize.description: Unubo通过将您喜爱的工具中的指标集中到一个位置，使您可以轻松跟踪进度。
localize.tagline: 简化对创业过程的跟踪

localize.description: Unubo通過將您喜愛的工具中的指標集中到一個位置，使您可以輕鬆跟蹤進度。
localize.tagline: 簡化對創業過程的跟蹤

next.excerpt: See errors, warnings, and logs as they happen on your site — without having to open the browser’s console. Find bugs you didn't know were there via notifications in toast format.
next.title: toast.log 2.0 - Get console errors right on your page (as toasts)

localize.description: 无需打开浏览器控制台，即可查看站点上发生的错误、警告和日志。通过Toast格式的通知查找您不知道的bug。
localize.tagline: 将控制台错误直接显示在您的页面上(作为祝酒词)

localize.description: 無需打開瀏覽器控制檯，即可查看站點上發生的錯誤、警告和日誌。通過Toast格式的通知查找您不知道的bug。
localize.tagline: 將控制檯錯誤直接顯示在您的頁面上(作爲祝酒詞)
